name: Cradles
description:
What is Cradles?

The development of Cradles started in July 2021.
After one year, we are about to release the latest version - Pre-alpha - for players. Cradles is a brand-new MMORPG where players will take on the role of an adventurer who travels from modern times to the wilderness to explore the world and unravel historical stories of centuries.
In Cradles, players can fight with monsters, compete in real-time against one another, dig for treasures and minerals to strengthen their equipment and level up. You can also experience different puzzle games in taverns and casinos to enrich your gaming experience. We also encourage livestreaming fans to join Cradles and contribute to Cradles together.

PvP

Challenge yourself in intense and exhilarating PvP battles against the greatest warriors in the open world of Cradles. Arm yourself and defeat your enemies with teamwork! Only the best warriors can win in PvP!

Guild Warfare

Join your guild for an exciting battle! Follow your leader, get extra attribute bonuses, slay enemies and seize their items. Make your guild a focus of world attention.

PvE

Fighting ancient creatures and beasts will allow you to gain not only sufficient EXP but also all the materials needed to build your equipment. Remember not to challenge the Bosses alone, team up to defeat them and you will become the savior.

Business Empire

It's a fully player-controlled economic system, even free players can earn crystals to exchange for gold coins. It's a free economic system, but be careful of being attacked by other players while gaining revenue, as thugs in danger areas are spying on you in the dark.

The Great Land

It's a customizable continent system for hardcore players, where you can create a continent of your own, grow crops and dig new resources on it. Everything is yours, but it's pricey to maintain it. So call your guild to protect the land together!
